title: Khloe Kardashian Warns Lamar Odom She'll Divorce Him If He Goes Back to Drugs
text:
Comments Khloe reportedly has warned Lamar to stay away from drugs and told him she would be ready to restart divorce proceedings if he relapses. 
Recently calling off her divorce to Lamar Odom , Khloe Kardashian has one condition for the athlete to fulfill. She reportedly wanted him to leave his past life of drugs or else she would walk away for good. TMZ reported that Khloe "is annoyed by people on social media who are calling her naive for dropping the divorce ." In fact, the reality star decided to call off the divorce "partly because Lamar has no one else in his life to help him recover." Moreover, the outlet cited sources as saying Lamar "is on the Kardashian health insurance policy and he needs to stay on." The former NBA star's "medical bills will total in the many millions, and our sources say he doesn't have the financial wherewithal to handle it on his own." No words just yet from Khloe regarding the report. She was spotted this weekend briefly leaving Cedars Sinai Medical Center to attend sister Kim Kardashian 's baby shower .
